titleStmt.title: The humble address of the Presbyterians, presented to the King by Mr. Hurst, Mr. Chester, Mr. Slater, Mr. Cox, Mr. Roswell, Mr. Turner, Mr. Franklin, Mr. Deal, and Mr. Reynolds with His Majesties gracious answer.
titleStmt.author: Alsop, Vincent, 1629 or 30-1703.
Hurst, Henry, 1629-1690.
England and Wales. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James II)
